div.p: The episcopal matter greatly distresses me.

I easily foresee what will happen unless the Lord intervenes in a miraculous way... Do what you are doing, namely, as it pertains to preserving the purity of religion and the tranquility of the republic, as much as can indeed be done... - I hear that Lussy from Lucerne has come and has been able to achieve so much that the Five Cantons have made a pact with the papists, etc.

It is written from Austria that from the occupied fortress of Erdeth, the Turks have gone to meet 2000 Saxon horsemen sent by the princes to aid Lazarus; he understood that the Turks wanted to prevent the two armies from joining.

Therefore, Lazarus pursued the Turks with his men and arrived in time, when there was a battle between the horsemen and the Turks; thus, the Turks were surrounded and cut down, and the Lazarites achieved a great victory, but that victory was very bloody.
You see where everything is heading and what the disturber of all kingdoms seeks: civil war. He wants to avenge his brother, the bloody Müser, under the guise of religion.
Soon I will inform you of joyful news regarding your case.
If only you would finally write something about the money of my Süleri! I could use it better than anything else, but I must do as I can.
